PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-05732017-06-02,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActYukon Act
Nunavut Act
Northwest Territories Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Department of Finance Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to provide greater clarity by correcting 1) the incorrect references to provisions of the Northwest Territories Act, and 2) the outdated references to the Canadian Institute of Chartered Accountants Public Sector Accounting Handbook.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0114 Publication Date: 2017-06-14
AttachmentsAttachment
